name: Twinstack
description: Twinstack is a puzzle game that challenges your multitasking skills. The goal of the game is to clear columns and balance the stack of blocks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2Ghz + Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
